main event: On 13 December 1956, a UFO report was filed regarding a sighting at Hamilton AFB, California.
interesting points: The object was described as a single spherical shape emitting an intense blue-white light., The object was tracked approximately 270 degrees direction relative to the observer., The sighting was made by Captain Alvin Haas, an aircrew member from the 25th Air Division., The light from the object lasted for about 4 seconds, according to radar data., There was no corroborating evidence from local flight facilities regarding this sighting.
sighted object: one spherical object emitting intense blue-white light
